roadmap
Consolidated Project Roadmap
Here you will find the current roadmaps and initiatives the project is leading.
Read our contribution guidelines and get involved.
Localization Roadmap
If you would like to help with translations (translate a new language or simply review) join the
OWASP Slack,
and raise your hand on the
# team-llm-translations
slack channel and share how you would like to help.
